name: Sprite
lore: Sprites are tiny, winged Fey who dwell in forests and meadows connected to the Feywild. As guardians of the natural world, sprites use their ability to sense a creature's emotional state and alignment to determine whether a stranger is a threat. Though diminutive, sprites are fierce defenders of their homelands, wielding tiny swords and bows that deliver sleep-inducing poison.

traits.name: Heart Sight
traits.description: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 40/160 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. If the saving throw result is 5 or lower, the Poisoned target also has the Unconscious condition for the same duration, ending early if the target takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

onFailure.effects: If the saving throw result is 5 or lower, the Poisoned target also has the Unconscious condition for the same duration, ending early if the target takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.description: The sprite casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using no spell slots.
